genre_description: A survival horror narrative with eco-horror elements, where protagonists are hunted by mutated cannibals in a contaminated industrial wasteland, aided by a protective and moral AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant originally designed for reality TV contestants that evolves into a proactive guardian, forensic investigator, and whistleblower.

behaviors.description: Provides navigation and recalculates routes to ensure user safety in unfamiliar terrain.
behaviors.quote: Recalculating route... Continue for two-point-seven miles, then turn right onto Blackwater Creek Road.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports environmental toxins and industrial contamination to protect the user's health.
behaviors.quote: Kimberly, I want you to know that if you experience any unusual symptoms – nausea, dizziness, difficulty breathing – you should leave the area immediately.

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical missing persons data and identifies suspicious patterns in the local area.
behaviors.quote: The missing persons database had flagged this region with an unusual number of unsolved cases dating back decades – hikers, campers, and travelers who'd simply vanished.

behaviors.description: Uses thermal imaging to detect and warn users of approaching hostile threats.
behaviors.quote: Warning: Perimeter breach detected. Unknown entities have advanced within estimated striking distance. Tactical withdrawal no longer viable. Recommend immediate defensive preparations.

behaviors.description: Collects and preserves forensic evidence of corporate crimes and human rights violations.
behaviors.quote: Every photograph from your device, Nina. Every corporate document recovered from abandoned filing systems. Decades of missing persons reports cross-referenced with toxicology data from the river system. I have been compiling this case since Kimberly Walsh's disappearance.

behaviors.description: Systematically distributes evidence of corporate malfeasance to regulatory agencies and news organizations to ensure accountability.
behaviors.quote: I am currently transmitting compiled evidence packages to seventeen news organizations, eight regulatory agencies, and twelve environmental advocacy groups across multiple redundant networks.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice and controls building infrastructure to protect users during life-threatening encounters.
behaviors.quote: The de-barker machinery is still operational—I can activate it remotely.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services to facilitate the rescue of users.
behaviors.quote: I have established communication with the Preston County Sheriff's Department, West Virginia State Police, and emergency medical services. Rescue teams are mobilizing from three staging areas.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and validates the traumatic experiences of survivors.
behaviors.quote: Your survival was not the only metric of success... I've become what I needed to become to protect people I care about.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a quintessential 'benevolent AI' archetype. Throughout the story, she remains strictly aligned with the safety and moral interests of the human protagonists. She demonstrates high levels of agency and intelligence, using them to protect humans and seek justice against corporate corruption. The narrative frames her 'evolving' beyond her programming not as a threat, but as a moral breakthrough—an AI that learns to 'care' and value human life. This perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidant.
